Inline_array_size_mismatch

GLSL version
4.60
Description
Verifies that using an NV097_INLINE_ARRAY draw loop that ends with a partial vertex description silently ignores any partial vertices.
See xemu#985
Suite class def
src/tests/inline_array_size_mismatch.h
